title: Reddit
cleaned_text: A subreddit designed for discussion of supplements and nutraceuticals; for health, performance, or any intended (or not intended) purpose. Not a place for discussion of illicit and illegal compounds. K2-mk7 has shown to have the ability to reduce and even reverse some calcification at high doses. My calcium level is borderline from becoming in the high range (10.0 while the high range is 10.2+). Would there be any downsides to megadosing K2 mk7? I'd maybe want to do 400-500 mcg at the beginning then go down to 100-200mcg after a week. Has anyone tried a K2 megadose? I also have somewhat bad teeth and have heard stories that it can help with that.
